title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 01 April 2015 - XWiki
content:

11:02 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
15:04 <Pbas> Hello there, are they a way to save a cookie with velocity? (because this issue is not resolved) thxs  
15:04 <cjd> $response.setCookie() ?  
15:04 <Pbas> ho thxs  
15:04 <cjd> $response is an XWikiHttpServletResponse as I recall  
15:04 <cjd> check documentation  
15:05 <Pbas> thxs I will try this one :)  
15:15 <vmassol> Pbas: FTR there's this issue about cookie tool too: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XCOMMONS-627 (not going to help you but FYI)  
15:16 <Pbas> yes thxs I saw this issue. It is my problem.  
15:17 <Pbas> cjd tell me to use $response but I didn't manage with this code:  $response.addCookie('test', 'super', 1)  
15:17 <Pbas> $request.getCookie("test")  
15:25 <Pbas> addCookie method doesn't working:  http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ScriptingDocumentation/?url=http:%2F%2Fnexus.xwiki.org%2Fnexus%2Fservice%2Flocal%2Frepositories%2Fpublic%2Farchive%2Forg%2Fxwiki%2Fplatform%2Fxwiki-platform-oldcore%2F6.4.2%2Fxwiki-platform-oldcore-6.4.2-javadoc.jar%2F!%2Fcom%2Fxpn%2Fxwiki%2Fweb%2FXWikiServletResponse.html%23addCookie%28java.lang.String,%20java.lang.String,%20int%29  
15:36 <DarkKnightCZ> Pbas: works for me, $response.addCookie("test", "value", 0), if you set age too short, you might not obtain it  
15:40 <Pbas> I didn't manage. Do you typing something before $response.addCookie("test", "value", 10) (except {{velocity}})?  
15:41 <Bugendolf> has quit  
15:42 <Bugendolf> has joined #xwiki  
15:42 <Pbas> I tried with xwiki 6.4 and 6.4.3  
15:47 <gdelhumeau> ci.xwiki.org is down  
15:47 <gdelhumeau> can I restart it?  
15:48 <vmassol> no  
15:48 <vmassol> :)  
15:48 <vmassol> infra is transferring stuff I believe  
15:48 <gdelhumeau> ok  
15:53 <Pbas> Ok addCookie with $response.addCookie("test", "super", 10000) falling in work!  
15:54 <Pbas> I think velocity didn't like I set cookie and read it in same page :-/  
15:54 <vmassol> ofc not  
15:54 <Pbas> thxs everyone  
15:54 <vmassol> that's not how cookie work!  
15:55 <vmassol> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTTP\_cookie :)  
15:55 <vmassol> it's the browser that sends the cookie  
15:55 <vmassol> (nothing to do with velocity)  
15:55 <Pbas> yes of course  
15:55 <vmassol> so you need 2 requests  
15:56 <vmassol> in the first one you set the cookie in teh response and in the following one it's sent by the browser to the server  
15:56 <Pbas> sorry about the mess but when i haven't time to finish my appli :-/  
15:56 <Pbas> sure!  
15:58 <vmassol> @gdelhumeau: the nexus server  has been moved but the DNS hasn't propagated yet  
15:58 <vmassol> so if we restart jenkins it's going to publish to the old maven repo and not the new one  
15:59 <gdelhumeau> yes ok
